servicedescription: Testwebservice with a Triple Store backend

datasets.query: SELECT ?wikidatacity ?wikidatacityLabel ?the_geom WHERE{ ?wikidatacity wdt:P31 wd:Q515 . ?wikidatacity wdt:P625 ?the_geom . SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language '[AUTO_LANGUAGE],en'. } }
datasets.name: WikidataCity

datasets.query: SELECT ?osmbar ?label ?lat ?lon WHERE{ ?osmbar rdf:type lgdo:Bar ; rdfs:label ?label ; geo-pos:lat ?lat ; geo-pos:long ?lon . }
datasets.name: OSMBar

datasets.query: SELECT ?geonamesplace ?class ?label ?lat ?lon WHERE{ ?geonamesplace rdf:type gn:Feature ; rdfs:label ?label ; geo-pos:lat ?lat ; geo-pos:long ?lon . }
datasets.name: GeoNamesPlace

datasets.query: SELECT ?namedplace ?rel ?val ?the_geom WHERE{ ?namedplace rdf:type ign:NamedPlace . ?namedplace ?rel ?val . OPTIONAL{?val geo:asWKT ?the_geom .} }
datasets.name: NamedPlace
